questions.question: The three main parts of the processor are _______/प्रोसेसर के तीन मुख्य भाग क्या हैं? [SBI Clerk, 2012]
questions.explanation: A processor consists of ALU (Arithmetic Logic Unit), Control Unit, and Registers.

questions.question: Which printer cannot print more than one character at a time?/कौन सा प्रिंटर एक बार में एक से अधिक वर्ण प्रिंट नहीं कर सकता? [SBI Clerk 2012]
questions.explanation: Daisy-wheel printer prints one character at a time using a wheel with characters on its petals.

questions.question: Which of the following does not relate to Input Unit?/निम्न में से कौन इनपुट यूनिट से संबंधित नहीं है? [SSC CHSL 2012]
options: It accepts data from the outside world.
It converts data into binary code that is understandable by the computer.
It converts binary data into the human readable form that is understandable to the users.
It sends data in binary form to the computer for further processing.
questions.explanation: Converting binary data into human readable form is the function of the Output Unit, not the Input Unit.

questions.question: ________ key is the example of Toggle key./_______ कुंजी टॉगल कुंजी का उदाहरण है। [IBPS Clerk 2012]
questions.explanation: Caps Lock is a toggle key because it switches between two states (ON/OFF) each time it is pressed.

questions.question: Video controller/वीडियो नियंत्रक क्या करता है? [IBPS Clerk 2012]
options: Controls the resolution of images on screen
Controls the signals to be sent and received from processor for display
Handles the entire electronic work behind the formation of images on the screen
Is responsible for allocating pixels for formation of images
Is responsible for the refresh rate of the screen / monitor
questions.explanation: Video controller handles the entire electronic work behind the formation of images on the screen.

questions.question: Which of these is a point-and-draw device?/इनमें से कौन सा पॉइंट-एंड-ड्रॉ डिवाइस है? [IBPS PO 2012]
questions.explanation: Mouse is a point-and-draw device used to point at items and draw in applications.

questions.question: When a key is pressed on the keyboard, which standard is used for converting the keystroke into the corresponding bits? [IBPS PO 2013]
questions.explanation: ANSI (American National Standards Institute) standard is used for converting keystrokes into corresponding bits.

questions.question: _______ devices convert human-understandable data and programs into a form that the computer can process. [SBI PO 2013]
questions.explanation: Input devices convert human-understandable data into a form the computer can process.

questions.question: The CPU comprises of Control, Memory, and ____ units./CPU में कंट्रोल, मेमोरी और ___ यूनिट्स होते हैं। [SBI PO 2013]
questions.explanation: CPU comprises of Control Unit, Memory Unit, and Arithmetic/Logic Unit (ALU).

questions.question: A joystick is primarily used to/for ___________./जॉयस्टिक का प्राथमिक उपयोग क्या है? [SBI PO 2013]
questions.explanation: A joystick is primarily used for computer gaming to control game characters and movements.

questions.question: Which part of the computer displays the work done?/कंप्यूटर का कौन सा भाग किए गए कार्य को प्रदर्शित करता है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Monitor is the display device that shows the work done on a computer.

questions.question: For seeing the output, you use––––––/आउटपुट देखने के लिए आप क्या उपयोग करते हैं? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Monitor is an output device used for seeing/viewing the output.

questions.question: A scanner scans––––––/स्कैनर क्या स्कैन करता है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: A scanner can scan both pictures and text, converting them to digital format.

questions.question: Which of the following is not an input device?/निम्न में से कौन इनपुट डिवाइस नहीं है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Monitor is an output device, not an input device.

questions.question: Back up of the data files will help to prevent ——/डेटा फाइल्स का बैकअप क्या रोकने में मदद करता है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Backup of data files helps prevent loss of data in case of system failure or accidental deletion.

questions.question: Which is the part of the computer system that one can physically touch?/कंप्यूटर सिस्टम का कौन सा भाग जिसे हम शारीरिक रूप से छू सकते हैं? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Hardware refers to the physical components of a computer that can be touched.

questions.question: — is processed by the computer into information./— कंप्यूटर द्वारा सूचना में संसाधित किया जाता है। [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Data is the raw input that is processed by the computer into meaningful information.

questions.question: To access properties of an object, the mouse technique to use is––./ऑब्जेक्ट की प्रॉपर्टीज तक पहुंचने के लिए किस तकनीक का उपयोग किया जाता है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Right-clicking on an object opens a context menu that provides access to its properties.

questions.question: A ––– can make it easier to play games./गेम खेलने को आसान बनाने के लिए एक ––– क्या हो सकता है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: A joystick is designed to make it easier to play computer games.

questions.question: Codes consisting of lines of varying widths or lengths that are computer-readable are known as/ऐसे कोड जो विभिन्न चौड़ाई या लंबाई की लाइनों से बने होते हैं और कंप्यूटर द्वारा पढे जा सकते हैं? [IBPS PO 2011]
questions.explanation: Bar codes consist of lines of varying widths that are computer-readable and used for product identification.

questions.question: Any data or instruction entered into the memory of a computer is considered as/कंप्यूटर की मेमोरी में दर्ज कोई भी डेटा या निर्देश किस रूप में माना जाता है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Any data or instruction entered into the memory of a computer is considered as input.

questions.question: Video processors consist of_____ and_____ which store and process images./वीडियो प्रोसेसर में कौन-कौन से होते हैं जो छवियों को स्टोर और प्रोसेस करते हैं? [IBPS PO 2011]
questions.explanation: Video processors consist of VGI (Video Graphics Interface) and DVI (Digital Visual Interface) which store and process images.

questions.question: A keyboard is this kind of device/कीबोर्ड किस प्रकार का उपकरण है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: A keyboard is an input device used for entering data and commands into the computer.

questions.question: Arithmetic operations/अंकगणितीय क्रियाएं [SBI Clerk 2009]
options: Involve matching one data item to another to determine if the first item is greater than, equal to, or less than the other item
Sort data items according to standard, predefined criteria in ascending order or descending order
Use conditions with operators such as AND, OR and NOT
Include addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
questions.explanation: Arithmetic operations include basic mathematical operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

questions.question: A series of instructions that tells a computer what to do and how to do it is called a/अनुदेशों की वह श्रृंखला जो कंप्यूटर को क्या करना है और कैसे करना है बताती है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: A program is a series of instructions that tells a computer what to do and how to do it.

questions.question: The main system board of a computer is called the/कंप्यूटर का मुख्य सिस्टम बोर्ड क्या कहलाता है? [IBPS Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: The main system board of a computer is called the Motherboard.

questions.question: Which of the following groups consist of only output devices?/निम्न में से कौन सा समूह केवल आउटपुट डिवाइसेस का है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: Plotter, Printer, and Monitor are all output devices. Scanner, Keyboard, and Mouse are input devices.

questions.question: Why is the Caps Lock key referred to as a toggle key?/कैप्स लॉक की कुंजी को टॉगल कुंजी क्यों कहा जाता है? [IBPS 2011]
options: Because its function goes back and forth every time it is pressed
questions.explanation: Caps Lock is called a toggle key because its function goes back and forth (ON/OFF) every time it is pressed.

questions.question: Using output devices one can/आउटपुट डिवाइसेस का उपयोग करके कोई क्या कर सकता है? [IBPS Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: Output devices like monitors and printers are used to view or print data.

questions.question: Which of the following categories would include a keyboard?/कीबोर्ड किस वर्ग में शामिल होगा? [IBPS Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: A keyboard is classified as an Input Device.

questions.question: What type of keys are 'ctrl' and 'shift'?/'ctrl' और 'shift' किस प्रकार की कुंजी हैं? [IBPS Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: Ctrl and Shift are modifier keys because they modify the function of other keys when pressed together.

questions.question: The term _________ refers to data storage systems that make it possible for a computer or electronic device to store and retrieve data. [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: Storage technology refers to data storage systems that enable storing and retrieving data.

questions.question: The term _________ refers to any computer component that is required to perform work. [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: A resource refers to any computer component required to perform work.

questions.question: The ________ is responsible for performing calculations and contains decision-making mechanisms. [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: The ALU (Arithmetic and Logic Unit) is responsible for performing calculations and contains decision-making mechanisms.

questions.question: You use a (n) ________, such as a keyboard or mouse, to input information. [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: An input device, such as a keyboard or mouse, is used to input information into a computer.

questions.question: What is output?/आउटपुट क्या है? [SBI Clerk 2011]
options: What the processor takes from the user
What the user gives to the processor
What the processor gets from the user
What the processor gives to the user
questions.explanation: Output is what the processor gives to the user after processing the input data.

questions.question: Computer_________ is whatever is typed, submitted, or transmitted to a computer system. [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: Computer input is whatever is typed, submitted, or transmitted to a computer system.

questions.question: Which process checks to ensure the components of the computer are operating and connected properly? [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: Booting is the process that checks to ensure all components of the computer are operating and connected properly.

questions.question: Ctrl, shift and alt are called _________ keys./Ctrl, Shift और Alt को क्या कहा जाता है? [SBI Clerk 2011]
questions.explanation: As per SBI Clerk 2011, Ctrl, Shift and Alt are called function keys (Note: they are also commonly known as modifier keys).

questions.question: Which keys enable the input of numbers quickly?/कौन से कीज नंबरों के त्वरित इनपुट की अनुमति देते हैं? [SBI 2011]
questions.explanation: The numeric keypad on the right side of the keyboard enables quick input of numbers.

questions.question: All the characters that a device can use is called its?/एक डिवाइस द्वारा उपयोग किए जा सकने वाले सभी वर्णों को क्या कहते हैं? [SBI Clerk 2012]
questions.explanation: All the characters that a device can use is called its Keyboard Characters.

questions.question: A printer is this kind of device/प्रिंटर किस प्रकार का उपकरण है? [SBI Clerk 2009]
questions.explanation: A printer is an output device that produces hard copies of documents.

questions.question: Most of the commonly used personal computers/laptops do not have a command key known as ____. [SSC CGL]
questions.explanation: Turnover is not a standard key on personal computers/laptops.

questions.question: Most of the commonly available personal computers/laptops have a keyboard popularly known as ___. [SSC CHSL]
questions.explanation: QWERTY is the most popular keyboard layout named after the first six letters on the top row.

questions.question: Whenever we have to give space between the two words while typing on PC we have to press a key known as __________. [SSC MTS]
questions.explanation: Space Bar is the key used to create space between words while typing.

questions.question: Every component of your computer is either/आपके कंप्यूटर का प्रत्येक घटक या तो [SSC CPO]
questions.explanation: Every component of a computer is either hardware (physical) or software (logical).

questions.question: What is equipment used to capture information and commands?/जानकारी और कमांड कैप्चर करने वाला उपकरण क्या है?
questions.explanation: Input device is the equipment used to capture information and commands.

questions.question: This type of hardware consists of devices that translate data into a form the computer can process [IBPS PO]
questions.explanation: Input hardware devices translate data into a form the computer can process.

questions.question: Which of the following will translate images of text, drawings, and photos into digital form?/निम्न में से कौन इमेजेस को डिजिटल फॉर्म में बदल सकता है? [IBPS Clerk]
questions.explanation: A scanner translates images of text, drawings, and photos into digital form.

questions.question: The computer is made of which of the following hardware equipments? [RRB]
options: Monitor, CPU, Keyboard, Mouse, Software and Network
Monitor, CPU, Keyboard, Mouse, Programme and Network
Monitor, CPU, Keyboard, Mouse, Printer and Modem
Monitor, CPU, Keyboard, Mouse, Applications and Network
questions.explanation: Monitor, CPU, Keyboard, Mouse, Printer and Modem are all hardware equipments.

questions.question: For selecting or highlighting, which of the following is generally used? [IBPS SO]
questions.explanation: Mouse is generally used for selecting or highlighting items on screen.

questions.question: Scanner scans/स्कैनर क्या स्कैन करता है? [SBI PO 2012]
questions.explanation: A scanner scans both pictures and text.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a function of the control unit?/निम्न में से कौन कंट्रोल यूनिट का कार्य नहीं है? [SBI 2012]
questions.explanation: Direct operations is not a primary function of the control unit. Its main functions are reading, executing and interpreting instructions.

questions.question: The most common input devices include –/सबसे आम इनपुट डिवाइसेस में क्या शामिल है? [SBI PO 2012]
questions.explanation: Mouse and keyboard are the most common input devices.

questions.question: Holding the mouse button down while moving an object or text is known as –/माउस बटन दबाए रखते हुए किसी वस्तु को स्थानांतरित करना क्या कहलाता है? [SBI Clerk 2012]
questions.explanation: Dragging is the action of holding the mouse button down while moving an object or text.

questions.question: __________ helps in capturing raw data and entering into computer system. [RBI Assistant]
questions.explanation: Input device helps in capturing raw data and entering it into the computer system.

questions.question: The most widely used input device is the _________./सबसे व्यापक रूप से उपयोग किया जाने वाला इनपुट डिवाइस कौन सा है? [NABARD]
questions.explanation: The keyboard is the most widely used input device.

questions.question: A CPU contains __________/CPU में क्या होता है? [RRB NTPC]
options: a card reader and a printing device
an analytical engine and a control unit
a control unit and an arithmetic logic unit
an arithmetic logic unit and a card reader
questions.explanation: A CPU contains a Control Unit and an Arithmetic Logic Unit (ALU).

questions.question: The system unit/सिस्टम यूनिट क्या है? [RRB JE]
options: is the container that houses electronic components
is a combination of hardware and software
questions.explanation: The system unit is a combination of hardware and software.

questions.question: The term used to define all input and output devices in a computer system is __________. [LIC AAO]
questions.explanation: Hardware is the term used to define all input and output devices in a computer system.

questions.question: What type of resource is most likely to be a shared common resource in a computer network? [FCI Manager]
questions.explanation: Printers are the most commonly shared resource in a computer network.

questions.question: Which of the following is part of the System Unit?/निम्न में से कौन सिस्टम यूनिट का हिस्सा है? [ISRO]
questions.explanation: CPU is part of the System Unit.

questions.question: What is output?/आउटपुट क्या है? [GATE]
questions.explanation: Output is what the processor gives to the user (none of the listed options are correct as per GATE answer key).

questions.question: Dumb terminals have terminals and __________./डम्ब टर्मिनल में टर्मिनल और __________ होते हैं। [UPSC Prelims]
questions.explanation: Dumb terminals have terminals and a Harddisk.

questions.question: Which of the following is not an output device?/निम्न में से कौन आउटपुट डिवाइस नहीं है? [DRDO CEPTAM]
questions.explanation: Scanner is an input device, not an output device.

questions.question: Devices that let the computer communicate with you./ऐसे डिवाइस जो कंप्यूटर को आपके साथ संवाद करने देते हैं।
questions.explanation: Output devices let the computer communicate with the user by displaying or printing results.

questions.question: Devices that allow you to put information into the computer./ऐसे डिवाइस जो आपको जानकारी दर्ज करने देते हैं। [CURDE]
questions.explanation: Input devices allow you to put information into the computer.

questions.question: The primary device that a computer uses to store information./कंप्यूटर में जानकारी स्टोर करने के लिए मुख्य डिवाइस कौन सा है? [GTRE SSC CGL]
questions.explanation: Hard drive is the primary device a computer uses to store information permanently.

questions.question: Pick the odd one –/अलग विकल्प चुनें [SSC CHSL]
questions.explanation: Printer is the odd one out as it is an output device while Mouse, Scanner, and Keyboard are input devices.

questions.question: An output device that lets you see what the computer is doing – [HSSC CET]
questions.explanation: Monitor-screen is the output device that lets you see what the computer is doing.

questions.question: Which of the following can input graphical images and pictures for a computer? [NAVY]
questions.explanation: Scanner can input graphical images and pictures into a computer.

questions.question: The function of CPU is –/CPU का कार्य क्या है? [CRPF]
options: to provide external storage of text
to read, interpret and process the information and instruction
questions.explanation: The CPU reads, interprets and processes the information and instructions.

questions.question: Printed information, called __________, exists physically and is a more permanent form of output. [MP Peb]
questions.explanation: Hard copy is the printed information that exists physically and is more permanent than a display.

questions.question: Which of the following is considered an input device?/निम्नलिखित में से कौन इनपुट डिवाइस माना जाता है?
questions.explanation: Keyboard is an input device used for entering data into the computer.

questions.question: Decreasing the amount of space required to store data and programs is accomplished by _______. [Delhi Police Head Constable]
questions.explanation: Compression is used to decrease the amount of space required to store data and programs.

questions.question: A device that copies or reproduces text and images is also called a(n) __________.
questions.explanation: An optical scanner is a device that copies or reproduces text and images.

questions.question: Which of the following is the equipment which holds the screen of a computer? [DSSSB 2025]
questions.explanation: Monitor is the equipment that holds the screen of a computer.

questions.question: What is usually used for displaying information at public places?/सार्वजनिक स्थानों पर जानकारी प्रदर्शित करने के लिए क्या उपयोग होता है? [UPSSSC]
questions.explanation: Monitors and Overhead Projections are used for displaying information at public places.

questions.question: Which of the following is not an output device?/निम्नलिखित में से कौन आउटपुट डिवाइस नहीं है? [ITI COPA 2025]
questions.explanation: Touch Screen is both an input and output device, making it not purely an output device.

questions.question: Every component of your computer is either/आपके कंप्यूटर का प्रत्येक घटक या तो [CTS COPA 2025]
questions.explanation: Every component of a computer is either hardware or software.

questions.question: The computer monitor is which type of device?/कंप्यूटर मॉनिटर किस प्रकार का डिवाइस है? [Railway]
questions.explanation: Computer monitor is an output device that displays the visual output.

questions.question: The primary output device for computers is a/कंप्यूटर के लिए प्रमुख आउटपुट डिवाइस क्या है? [CCC 2025]
questions.explanation: Video monitor is the primary output device for computers.

questions.question: The output which is made up of pictures, sounds, and video is called/जिस आउटपुट में चित्र, ध्वनि, और वीडियो शामिल होते हैं? [CCC 2025]
questions.explanation: Multimedia output is made up of pictures, sounds, and video.

questions.question: __________ provides the means to move the pointer on the screen and give information to the computer by clicking its buttons. [CCC 2025]
questions.explanation: Mouse provides the means to move the pointer on screen and give information by clicking.

questions.question: Which of the following could be digital input devices for computers? [CCC 2025]
questions.explanation: Digital camcorder, microphone, and scanner are all digital input devices for computers.

questions.question: When speaking of computer input and output, input refers to [CCC 2025]
options: any data processing that occurs from new data input into computer
retrieval of data or information that has been entered into the computer
data or information that has been entered into the computer
the transmission of data that has been entered into the computer
questions.explanation: Input refers to data or information that has been entered into the computer.

questions.question: A means of capturing an image (drawing or photo) so that it can be stored on a computer is [JKSSB]
questions.explanation: Scanner is the means of capturing an image so that it can be stored on a computer.

questions.question: Access control based on a person's fingerprints is an example of [SBI PO 2012]
questions.explanation: Access control based on fingerprints is an example of biometric identification.

questions.question: The patterns of printed lines on most products are called/अधिकांश उत्पादों पर छपे लाइनों के पैटर्न को क्या कहते हैं?
questions.explanation: Barcodes are the patterns of printed lines on most products used for identification.

questions.question: Which of the following is needed for sound recording?/ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग के लिए किसकी आवश्यकता होती है?
questions.explanation: Microphone is needed for sound recording as it converts sound to electrical signals.

questions.question: Codes consisting of bars or lines of varying widths or lengths that are computer-readable are known as_______. [CCC 2025]
questions.explanation: Bar codes consist of bars or lines of varying widths that are computer-readable.

questions.question: In a computer most processing takes place in _________./कंप्यूटर में अधिकतर प्रोसेसिंग कहाँ होती है? [CCC 2025]
questions.explanation: In a computer, most processing takes place in the CPU (Central Processing Unit).

questions.question: Keyboards, scanners, and microphones are examples of _______./कीबोर्ड, स्कैनर और माइक्रोफोन किसके उदाहरण हैं?
questions.explanation: Keyboards, scanners, and microphones are examples of input devices.

questions.question: Which of the following is part of the System Unit?/निम्न में से कौन सिस्टम यूनिट का हिस्सा है? [SBI PO 2012]
questions.explanation: CPU is a part of the System Unit.

questions.question: Which of the following groups consist of only input devices? [SBI Clerk 2012]
questions.explanation: Mouse, Keyboard, and Scanner are all input devices.

questions.question: A hard copy of a document is __________./किसी दस्तावेज की हार्ड कॉपी क्या होती है? [CBSE Computer Science 2025]
questions.explanation: A hard copy is a document printed on the printer.

questions.question: The ALU performs _________ operations./ALU कौन से ऑपरेशन करता है? [MDU BCA 2025]
questions.explanation: The ALU (Arithmetic Logic Unit) performs logic and arithmetic operations.

questions.question: The most common method of entering text and numerical data into a computer system is through the use of a _____. [CG Vyapam]
questions.explanation: Keyboard is the most common method of entering text and numerical data.

questions.question: ALU works on the instructions and data held in the/ALU किन निर्देशों और डेटा पर काम करता है? [CITS COPA Entrance]
questions.explanation: ALU works on the instructions and data held in the Registers.

questions.question: What is a device that can change images into codes for the computer?/ऐसा कौन सा उपकरण है जो कंप्यूटर के लिए चित्रों को कोड में बदल सकता है? [CTI COPA Entrance]
questions.explanation: Scanner is a device that can change images into codes (digital format) for the computer.
